title: Discover the 5 New Rules to Building Enterprise Apps That Matter
text:
What: Mobile enterprise apps offer the potential to generate billions in new revenue while significantly improving employee productivity and business efficiency. But according to analyst firm IDC, one in every three mobile enterprise apps fall short of expectations due to major challenges with usability, security, maintenance and more. To help companies overcome these barriers, Globo Plc (LSE-AIM: GBO, OTCQX: GOBPY) has identified “ 5 New Rules for Building Enterprise Apps That Matter .”
It’s a fresh, provocative take on how enterprises can build apps that increase revenue, maximize productivity, minimize costs and deliver brand-differentiating consumer experiences. In short – how they can create apps that matter.
Globo is a global provider of enterprise mobility and mobile application development platforms and services. The company has built apps that matter for household names such as Intel, GE, Procter & Gamble and The Coca-Cola Company. That experience drove the insights shared in “5 New Rules for Building Enterprise Apps That Matter.”
Key lessons from the new report include:
· A role-based design strategy is critical for maximizing employee usage. That starts with analyzing workflows to ensure the app provides the data employees need, in the order they need it.
· Security and compliance can’t be an afterthought. Savvy developers address device and app management, end-to-end encryption, policy-based access control and secure containers from day one of mobile app planning.
· Future proofing is achievable. Wearables are just one example of how rapidly and dramatically the mobile landscape evolves. How can developers be prepared for new devices, OS version updates and regulation changes? “5 New Rules for Building Enterprise Apps That Matter” has the answer.
When: “ 5 New Rules for Building Enterprise Apps That Matter ” is available immediately for download. It’s part of Globo’s new “Apps That Matter” program to help companies create and revamp their apps to ensure innovative mobile experiences for their consumers, partners, and employees.
About Globo: Globo ( GBO.L ) ( GOBPY ) empowers the mobile enterprise by enabling employees to work and collaborate from anywhere, anytime and by extending the enterprise’s engagement with customers and partners. Globo is unique in offering a complete enterprise mobility solution by merging Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM), Mobile Application Development Platform (MADP) and professional services. Globo solutions cover critical areas for a “Mobile First” enterprise, which are data security, app and device management as well as app design and development. The Group operates internationally in USA, Europe, Middle East and South East Asia, and has achieved worldwide recognition from leading analysts firms like Gartner, IDC and OVUM. For more information visit www.globoplc.com.
